body.p: Using DITA XML, write documentation about uploading files onto a GitHub repository.Use dedicated topic types (Task, Concept, Reference) and explain:-What is GitHub-What is a GitHub project-How to upload a file-How to update a file (that is already uploaded)-What are the available options for managing files in GitHub repository(optional) Share your work results in our closed Facebook group. In case of questions or once ready send me a mail at jordan.stanchev@jpdocu.com
